page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: Gawsworth Church and Chapel. The Chapel.Gawsworth Chapel was built in 1897. The minister is the Rev. Stephen Brown,but there are lots of other preachers who come each week. Mrs.Biddulph takes the Sunday School. Mrs.Longson takes the Girls'Brigade on Tuesdays in the Hall at the back of the Chapel.On Wednesdays the Ladies'Circle have their meeting in the Hall. The Church. St.James's Church at Gawsworth is 550 years old. Its design is similar to a Norman Chapel and was a daughter Church of Prestbury. The roof was put on in 1430,it was a reddish brown colour, and if you look carefully you can just see some of the red still showing.The Chancel and the tower were built in 1480.Some of the Gargoyles - continued on page 15.
